text: "Driven to Tears" is a 1980 song by The Police and is the second track from their third studio album Zenyatta Mondatta. It was not released as a single and is played on classic rock radio stations is immediately followed by When the World Is Running Down, You Make the Best of What's Still Around. Category:1980 songs Category:The Police songs Category:Pearl Jam songs
title: Driven to Tears
